titles.title: Recognizing the continuing legacy of the Buffalo Soldiers and expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the establishment of a Buffalo Soldiers Heritage Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 10/8/2004--Introduced. Recognizes the continuing legacy of the Buffalo Soldiers throughout the world. Supports the designation of a Buffalo Soldiers Heritage Month to recognize the contributions of the Buffalo Soldiers and for their bravery and service to the United States. Urges the President to issue a proclamation calling upon the people of the United States to observe such month each year with appropriate ceremonies and activities.
